directions: Combine the mayonnaise, sesame oil, lime juice, chili garlic paste, black sesame seeds and red pepper flakes in a large bowl. Fold in the tuna and green onions and season with salt. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: Four 5-ounce cans tuna in water (no salt added), drained
title: Spicy Sesame Tuna Salad
